metadata.Title: CVE-2021-34552 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Pillow through 8.2.0 and PIL (aka Python Imaging Library) through 1.1.7 allow an attacker to pass controlled parameters directly into a convert function to trigger a buffer overflow in Convert.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> limited to a DoS only because of FORTIFY_SOURCE

criterions.comment: pillow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
